name: Grilled Leg of Lamb Steaks
author: nichole
summary: This is the first time I tried leg steaks. I found them to be a delicious and very tender cut of lamb. This is how I was told to prepare them by my mother. Mmmmm very good.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place lamb steaks in a single layer in a shallow dish
Cover with olive oil, garlic, rosemary, salt, and pepper
Flip steaks to coat both sides
Let sit until steaks absorb flavors, about 30 minutes
Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil the grate
Cook steaks until browned on the outside and slightly pink in the center, about 5 minutes per side for medium
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 140 degrees F (60 degrees C)
